item.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade is a mobile game based on the world-famous anime. Once again, you can plunge into the story and go through it with the main characters. The combat system is quite simple, but together with interesting mechanics and plot, it will instantly captivate fans of this anime. To make your gameplay even more enjoyable, you can redeem Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade codes.

Updated November 24, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Stay up to date with our regularly updated guide. Enjoy all the benefits that these codes provide.

All Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade Codes

Working Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade Codes

  • JJKPPonwards - Enter this code to get Cube x300.
  • JJKPPWEEK1 - Enter this code to get JP x30,000.
  • JJKCODE - Enter this code to get Beacon of Recollection Bits x10,000 and JP x10,000.
  • JJK777 - Enter this code to get Beacon of Training x20,000.
  • JJKGIFT - Enter this code to get AP Supplementary Pack x1.
  • JJK2024 - Enter this code to get Cube x300.

Expired Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade Codes

  • JJKPPSorcerer - Enter this code to get Beacon of Training x20,000.
  • JJKPPSPECIAL - Enter this code to get Beacon of Recollection Bits x10,000.
  • JJKPPCURSE - Enter this code to get JP x20,000.
  • JJKPPDomEx - rewards.
  • ReleaseDay - Enter this code to get AP Supplementary Pack x1 and Gacha Ticket x1.

How to Redeem Codes in Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade

If you are an experienced player, you probably know that redeeming codes in mobile games is not much more difficult than in Roblox . Usually, you only need to go through a tutorial to understand the mechanics of the game and how to move forward. After that, you are free to act and can find the redemption option in your account settings. For example, in Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade , you just need to go to the Menu. However, newcomers may get confused in the interface, so to help them, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade .

  • Pay attention to the lower-right corner of the screen. Press the Menu button.
  • Then press the Code button.
  • In the white field, enter a code from the list of working codes and click OK.

Remember that expired codes will not bring rewards, so redeem them as soon as possible while they are active.

How to Get More Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade Codes

Codes in mobile games bring good rewards, so many players look for them. You can usually find them on the developer's social media or in guides like this one. We check all the codes regularly and add new ones to keep you informed about freebies. Therefore, we recommend that you bookmark this guide in your browser.

Jujutsu Kaisen Phantom Parade is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Horror Tower Defense Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Horror Tower Defense will immerse you in a spooky adventure, a great campaign full of interesting detailed levels, and a large variety of creepy enemies. Here, you need to create a team of characters by summoning them for in-game money, but it can take quite a while to grind.

Fortunately, like in other Roblox games, you can save a lot of time in Horror Tower Defense by redeeming codes. Each of them will reward you with a bunch of freebies, including a decent amount of currency, so don't miss out.

Updated November 24, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Our goal is to keep this guide up to date. Please visit it regularly to find new codes.

All Horror Tower Defense Codes

Working Horror Tower Defense Codes

  • TRAITS - Redeem this code to get Coins. (NEW)
  • Herbert - Redeem this code to get Coins.

Expired Horror Tower Defense Codes

  • QUESTS - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • TRADING - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 150 Coins.

In Horror Tower Defense , as in other games of this genre, a significant part of your success depends on the composition of your team. Redeeming the codes will give you a lot of currency, which is enough to summon and upgrade new units, so hurry up.

How to Redeem Codes for Horror Tower Defense

Horror Tower Defense 's redemption system is simple, and you've seen it in other Roblox games. If you haven't had any experience with redeeming codes or don't know how it works, we've prepared a step-by-step guide that you can use:

  • Launch Horror Tower Defense .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in two rows. Among them, interact with the second one in the second row which says Rewards.
  • This will open the Rewards menu. Here, interact with the Codes button, which is located at the top of the menu.
  • This will open the redemption section. There will be an input field and a green Claim button below it. Now, enter one of the working codes mentioned above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Horror Tower Defense Codes

To get more Horror Tower Defense codes, be sure to visit the game's official social media. By closely following the updates and news, you will definitely not miss the publication of the next Roblox codes:

  • Official Horror Tower Defense Roblox group.
  • Official Horror Tower Defense Discord server.

item.title: Genshin Impact: Starving Artist Achievement Guide (Precious Chest Reward)
item.description:
In Genshin Impact Natlan, players won't find Seelies. This is related to the lore between the region, the Abyss, and the Night Kingdom. Instead, the blue spirits are replaced by a Phlogiston-infused-like creatures that "walk" when they move; they're functionally similar to the Seelies. These adorable spirits are said to have been born from ancient graffiti. These graffiti are where players should bring back the Monetoo after they wander around or put themselves in danger. Of course, like the Seelies, helping the Monetoo will also grant players some rewards like Chests or achievements in Genshin Impact .

Not only normal Monetoo that adopt the blue-orange-red mixed color of the Phlogiston, there are also Hued Monetoo that only have one solid color. These peculiar Hued Monetoo can help players solve some puzzles that require coloring, as they can be thrown at an object to color them. Travelers can even carry two Monetoo simultaneously to "mix" their colors. However, coloring and mixing aren't the only tasks players will find while helping these Hued Monetoo. At times, Travelers can let out their hidden artistic side and simply splash different colors onto a wall. By doing this, players can get the Starving Artist achievement in Genshin Impact .

Starving Artist Achievement In Genshin Impact

To find the Hued Monetoo puzzle that grants the Starving Artist achievement in Genshin Impact , head to the waterfall north of the Masters of the Night-Wind tribe area. Near the Master Trainer Kinne in Genshin Impact , players can find groups of trapped Hued Monetoo that must be rescued.

Here's how players can rescue the Hued Monetoo and get the Starving Artist achievement in Genshin Impact :

First, look at the two Sauroform Tribal Warriors that are investigating the Monetoo on the ground; defeat them. This will move the first batch of the Hued Monetoo to the group. Next, indwell an Iktomisaur and scan the Nightspirit Grafitti on the wall. Place the graffiti on the box to lift it, revealing more Hued Monetoo underneath.

Finally, use the Spiritspeaking ability again with an Iktomisaur or Masters of the Night-Wind characters like Ororon in Genshin Impact to lift a floatie that's trapping some Monetoo in the water.

After all the Hued Monetoo are grouped together, approach them and start coloring the wall by holding down the Elemental Skill button . Keep coloring the wall until players get the Starving Artist achievement, and a Precious chest will spawn in Genshin Impact . Collect the Precious chest to get rewards such as Primogems and a chance to get an Obsidian Fragment.

item.title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Player Moves Beartic Incredibly Far Distance Across the Map
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Paldea boasts diverse environments with unique Pokemon species.
  • A Reddit user successfully navigated a wild Beartic from Glaseado Mountain to Poco Path.
  • Pokemon Scarlet and Violet's continued popularity hints at high expectations for future games.

A dedicated Pokemon Scarlet and Violet player took on an unusual challenge, leading a wild Beartic from its icy home of Glaseado Mountain to the grassy fields of Poco Path. This unusual adventure highlights how Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players continue to enjoy their time in Paldea, over a year after the game’s initial release.

The Paldea region in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet offers a diverse range of environments, from the icy peaks of Glaseado Mountain to the sunlit beaches of the South Province. Each area hosts unique Pokemon species suited to its biome, making exploration essential for catching them all. For instance, desert zones like Asado Desert feature ground and rock-type creatures, while grassy plains are home to more common Pokemon like Lechonk. Some pocket monsters roam around Paldea freely, while others like Beartic only reside in their favorite areas.

A Pokemon Scarlet and Violet player known as NamazuGirl on Reddit shared how they meticulously kited a wild Beartic from its home on Glaseado Mountain to Poco Path, an area near the game’s starting zone. This dedicated player shared a map of Pokemon Scarlet and Violet illustrating their journey across Paldea with this wild Beartic, as well as pictures of Beartic following them through various biomes such as grassy fields, rocky slopes, and sandy desert terrain. Moving a wild Pokemon this far without losing it to the game’s mechanics is a rare accomplishment, requiring patience and strategy to ensure the Beartic continued to follow and did not reset to go back to its natural Glaseado Mountain habitat.

Beartic Crosses the Entire Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Map

In the comments to this Reddit post, fellow Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players commended NamazuGirl for their commitment to this unusual challenge. Some joked about how the Beartic must have felt about its long trek, while others wondered if similar challenges could be attempted with other Pokemon. Comments also speculated about the mechanics that made this feat possible, including how the game’s AI handles wild Pokemon behavior when far from their natural habitat. Once they reached Poco Path, NamazuGirl finally captured Beartic, putting an end to their incredible journey across Paldea’s large open world.

This unique Beartic adventure comes as Pokemon Scarlet and Violet continues its reign as a commercial success. Having sold over 25 million copies as of September 2024, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet ’s popularity raises expectations for the next installment in the series. Players are already speculating about how Game Freak could innovate in Generation 10, but they will have to wait before the company reveals more information about the upcoming installment in the series.

item.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - Best Early-Game Armor For Warriors
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Lightweight inventory management in Dragon Age: The Veilguard allows players to collect armor without worrying about space.
  • The Explorer's Suit provides lightning resistance early on and is accessible shortly after the prologue.
  • The Casings Of Fortune offers style and function, providing bonuses for perfect blocks and benefiting companions.

Dragon Age: The Veilguard has reignited the long-stagnant Dragon Age series, prompting many fans to return to Origins and play through the entire series to experience the world of Thedas once more. This series makes many changes to the established formula, but the lightweight inventory management that doesn't worry about carry weight is a blessing.

Part of the luxury that comes with this type of inventory is that any armor that can be collected belongs to the player for good, without needing to worry about selling things off for space. This means players are free to constantly experiment with their armor and find out what suits their playstyle best. In particular, these armors are all great pieces of equipment to collect in the early game, each offering a unique augmentation of the Warrior class.

6 Explorer's Suit

Provides Vital Lightning Resistance In The Early Game

  • Armor Class: Heavy
  • Faction: Veil Jumpers
  • Base Defense: 153
  • Base Ability Damage: 32%

The many fade-touched creatures of Arlathan Forest have lightning powers that can make short work of fresh players, especially as this forest is one of the first areas players will explore. The Explorer's Suit provides resistance to lightning damage and immunity to its corresponding debuff, shocked.

This armor makes short work of the initial areas of Arlathan Forest, it's relatively inexpensive, and available shortly after the prologue at the Veil Jumpers faction shop. It's an altogether fantastic piece of armor that only grows stronger as it is upgraded.

5 Pursuant's Implements

A Lighter Armor That Augments Potions

  • Armor Class: Medium
  • Faction: Grey Wardens
  • Base Defense: 136
  • Base Ability Damage: 78%

In the Griffon Aerie section of the game, players can find a chest with the Pursuant's Implements inside. This armor set is lighter than most armor on this list, but as a medium armor, it pairs excellently with the Eclectic Armorer perk.

This armor set is built around bolstering potions, which can be great for a tankier warrior who needs to focus on survivability. Further along the upgrade path, this armor gives players a bonus to potion healing regardless of potion type, meaning grenade users also get a bonus to health as well.

4 Casings Of Fortune

Both Style And Function

  • Armor Class: Heavy
  • Faction: Lords of Fortune
  • Base Defense: 168
  • Base Ability Damage: 37%

Found in the Warden's Castle in the region of Rivain during Taash's recruitment quest, this armor is perfect for those who understand that the true endgame in The Veilguard is fashion. As a bonus, it also has an incredibly cohesive and beneficial set of bonuses as it gets upgraded.

The Casting of Fortune provides bonuses and benefits to both Rook and their companions whenever Rook lands a perfect block—something that warriors should be doing often. For those who have mastered the perfect block system, this glitzy armor is a no-brainer.

3 Frontline Plated Mail

An Ever-Reliable Piece Of Gear

  • Armor Class: Heavy
  • Faction: Grey Wardens
  • Base Defense: 175
  • Base Ability Damage: 41%

Whether going for a heavy-weapon, block-focused, or even shield-tossing build, the Frontline Plated Mail , acquired at the Grey Warden faction merchant, is a staple for almost any warrior build and provides solid, reliable defense and damage resistance.

This armor focuses on building up a strong foundation of physical resistance in the early levels of its upgrades, before expanding into bleeding resistance, and finally inflicting bleeding on enemies at low health in the later parts of its upgrade path. Resistance to physical damage is never unwelcome, and the addition of bleeding resistance, plus a great way to turn the tables on enemies when reaching low health, is just the icing on top. This is a workhorse set of armor if there ever was one, "Ol' Reliable" for warriors of all stripes.

2 Spined Encasement

Gruesome And High-Quality Armor

  • Armor Class: Medium
  • Faction: Mourn Watch
  • Base Defense: 132
  • Base Ability Damage: 78%

This high-quality armor set is a fantastic pick for Warriors, especially those focusing on a reaper build. It's important to note, however, that while every faction has its perks, this particular set of armor is only available to Mourn Watch players.

Like most medium armor, Spined Encasement sacrifices defense for ability damage, but the abilities supplement this by increasing damage resistance from demons and undead. It is sold by the Mourn Watch faction shop, and further supplementing its defense is a bonus to overall defense relative to Mourn Watch strength.

1 Champion's Brilliant Regalia

Ornate And Grand Armor

  • Armor Class: Heavy
  • Faction: Grey Wardens
  • Base Defense: 180
  • Base Ability Damage: 44%

Found towards the end of the early game as well at a Converged City merchant, this armor is a grand example of Grey Warden pride. What frontline plated mail does for physical damage and bleeding, the Champion's Brilliant Regalia does for fire damage and burning.

This armor gradually increases resistance to fire damage, and beyond this, allows players to dowse the area in retributive fire when reaching low health. It's an excellent armor piece to finish off the early game of The Veilguard and head off into the mid-game.
